data.name: MinSimulatedIMC
data.value: *3* hours of *flight training* by *reference to instruments* in *{0}*

data.name: MinTestPrep
data.value: *3* hours of *flight training* in *{0}* within *2 calendar months* prior to exam

data.name: MinXCDistance
data.value: One *solo cross-country* flight of *{1}NM* total distance and a leg that is at least *{2}NM*, with *three takeoffs and landings to a full-stop* in *{0}*

data.name: MinXCNight
data.value: One *night-time cross-country training* flight of over *{1}NM* distance in *{0}*

data.name: NoteIMCRequirements
data.value: Where actual or simulated instrument time is recorded, the required maneuvers (climbs/turns/straight and level flight/etc.) are assumed to have been performed.

data.name: NoteNightRequirements
data.value: See [FAR 61.110](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.110) for possible exceptions that may apply to you. Night landings are assumed to have involved flight in the traffic pattern.

data.name: NoteXCLandings
data.value: Landings are assumed to have been at the listed airports.

data.name: ErrUnauthorized
data.value: You are not authorized to view the progress for the requested pilot. Your progress is being shown instead.

data.name: CommMinComplexAMEL
data.value: *10* hours of *training* in a *complex* (or turbine, or TAA) *multi-engine airplane*

data.name: CommMinComplexAMES
data.value: *10* hours of *training* in a *multi-engine seaplane* with flaps and a controllable pitch propeller (or turbine, or TAA).

data.name: CommMinComplexASEL
data.value: *10* hours of *training* in a *complex* (or turbine, or TAA) airplane

data.name: CommMinComplexASES
data.value: *10* hours of *training* in a *single-engine seaplane* with flaps and a controllable pitch propeller (or turbine, or TAA).

data.name: CommMinNightLandings
data.value: *10 solo* landings at *night* in *{0}* (flight in the traffic pattern and a control tower are assumed)

data.name: CommMinTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight time as a pilot.

data.name: CommPICSoloXCCategory
data.value: A *solo cross-country* flight in *{0}* of not less than *300NM* total distance, with *3 landings*, at least one of which is *250NM* away from the departure point (straight line).

data.name: CommSoloXCHelicopter
data.value: A *cross-country flight* in a *helicopter* with landings at *3* points, with one segment at least *50NM* from the original point of departure.

data.name: CommXCCategory
data.value: A *2-hour cross-country training* flight in *{0}* in *daytime* conditions with total distance (straight line) over *{1}NM* from the point of departure.

data.name: CommXCCategoryNight
data.value: A *2-hour night cross-country training* flight in *{0}* with total distance (straight line) over *{1}NM* from point of departure.

data.name: GliderMinFlightTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight time in a *glider*

data.name: GliderMinSoloTime
data.value: *2* hours of *solo* flight time in a *glider*

data.name: GliderMinTestPrep
data.value: *3 training* flights with an *instructor* in a *glider* within *2* calendar months prior to test.

data.name: MinInstrumentTestPrep
data.value: *3* hours of *instrument* flight *training* in *{0}* within *2* calendar months prior to test.

data.name: MinInstrumentTime
data.value: *40* hours of *actual or simulated instrument* time

data.name: MinInstrumentXC
data.value: A *cross-country* flight in *{0}* of at least *{1}NM* with at least *3* approaches.

data.name: MinXCDistanceHelicopter
data.value: One *solo cross-country* flight in *{0}* of *{1}NM* total distance and landings at least *{2}NM* apart, with *three landings*

data.name: MinXCNight50nm
data.value: One *night-time cross-country* flight of over *50nm* distance in *{0}*

data.name: Note611293i
data.value: If you log simulated instrument time, it is assumed that you practiced partial panel, unusual flight attitudes, intercepting/tracking, etc., as required.

data.name: NoteCommMinPICXC
data.value: Cross-country PIC for a flight is determined as the minimum of PIC time and cross-country time for that flight

data.name: NoteGliderSoloLandings
data.value: %APP_NAME% assumes that if you have solo time in a flight, you were solo for the launch and landings as well, and that you had as many launches as landings.

data.name: NoteInstrumentTime
data.value: [61.65(h), (i), and (j)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.65) allow simulators/FTDs/ATDs to contribute towards this as well. %APP_NAME% treats any ATD as a BATD unless the text "AATD" is found in either the model name or in the flight's comments.

data.name: NoteInstrumentXC
data.value: %APP_NAME% assumes that the flight is conducted under instrument rules if it contains simulated or actual IMC time. %APP_NAME% does not validate that different kinds of approaches were performed, nor that they were performed at each airport, nor that the flight was along airways.

data.name: NoteNightXC
data.value: Nighttime cross-country is assumed to be the smaller of the night flight time and cross-country time recorded in a flight.

data.name: NoteXCTime
data.value: [61.65(g)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.65) allows fewer hours than this if you are applying for a combined private pilot/instrument rating certificate.

data.name: OverallProgressDisclaimer
data.value:
%APP_NAME% cannot determine with 100% reliability that a given milestone has been met; some inference is often required. In addition, various substitutions or credits may be applicable based on information beyond what %APP_NAME% can determine, so your personal requirements may differ from what is listed here. Furthermore, note that many ratings require that the training hours required for that rating be done specifically in pursuit of that rating; e.g., training spent on a Private PIlot certificate may not apply towards a Commercial certificate. %APP_NAME% cannot reliably distinguish this training, so be sure that you have actually met the minimum requirements.
FAR 61.63 may also render some or all of these milestones moot.
YOU ARE ULTIMATELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ENSURING THAT YOU HAVE THE REQUIRED AERONAUTICAL EXPERIENCE.

data.name: RecreationalMinSolo
data.value: *3* hours of *solo* flying in the aircraft *in the category/class* for the rating being sought.

data.name: RecreationalMinXC
data.value: *2* hours of *training* en-route to an airport at least *25NM* away, including at least *3 take-offs and landings* at the 2nd airport.

data.name: RecreationalMinXCNote
data.value: Only landings are counted here; takeoffs are assumed, and one landing at the home airport is assumed, so 4 landings must be found. If 4 or more landings are found, it is assumed that at least 3 of these were at the far airport.

data.name: RecreationTestPrep
data.value: *3* hours of flight *training* within *2* calendar months prior to test.

data.name: Note61129TrainingDevice
data.value: FAR [61.129(i)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.129) provides mechanisms by which time in a simulator or FTD may count towards requirements in 61.129, based on various conditions. %APP_NAME% does NOT include time in a training device towards your goal, so you may have met it even if %APP_NAME% says otherwise.

data.name: Part141ControltowerWarning
data.value: %APP_NAME% cannot determine if these takeoffs/landings were done at an airport with an operating control tower; please ensure that this is the case.

data.name: Part141InstrumentTraining
data.value: *3* hours of *training* in basic instrument maneuvers in *{0}*

data.name: Part141MinTime
data.value: At least *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight *training* time

data.name: Part141NightXC
data.value: 1 *Night cross-country* flight in *{0}* of more than *{1}NM* distance

data.name: Part141SoloLandings
data.value: *3 solo* landings to a *full-stop* at an airport with an *operating control tower* in *{0}*

data.name: Part141SoloTakeoffs
data.value: *3 solo* takeoffs at an airport with an *operating control tower* in *{0}*

data.name: Part141SoloTraining
data.value: At least *5* hours of *solo* flight training in {0}

data.name: Part141SoloXC
data.value: One *solo 100NM cross-country* flight with one segment over *50NM* and *landings at 3 points* in *{0}*

data.name: Part141TestPrep
data.value: *3* hours in prep for the practical test within *60 days* preceding the date of the test in *{0}*

data.name: NoteSoloTime
data.value: A flight MUST include the "Solo Time" to count towards this; logging PIC time is not sufficient.

data.name: ATPAirplaneSimulatorNote
data.value: A maximum of 25 hours of simulator/FTD time may contribute to this. An additional 25 hours in a simulator or training device may also be applicable here if it was done at a certified Part 142 training center

data.name: ATPNightPICTime
data.value: *25* hours of *night PIC* flight time in *airplanes*

data.name: ATPPICTimeNote
data.value: SIC time while performing the duties of PIC under the supervision of a PIC is allowed by the regulations but is not included here. Also, per 61.159(a)(5)(ii), horizontal flight time in a powered lift may also be credited subject to 61.73; %APP_NAME% includes this if found, but may *overstate* your experience because it does not distinguish horizontal flight time nor does it know if you comply with 61.73.

data.name: ATPMinPLPICNight
data.value: *25* hours of *PIC night* flight in a *powered-lift*

data.name: ATPMinPLPICXC
data.value: *100* hours of *PIC cross-country* time in a *powered-lift*

data.name: AirshipDPIC
data.value: *5* hours performing the *duties of PIC* with an instructor.

data.name: AirshipXCNightFlight
data.value: 1 *night cross-country* flight of at least *25NM* distance in *an airship*

data.name: BalloonAscent
data.value: At least one flight involving a controlled *ascent to {0:#,###}ft* above the launch site

data.name: BalloonGasMinFlights
data.value: *2* flights of at least *2* hours each in a *gas balloon*

data.name: BalloonGasMinFlightsDPIC
data.value: One *2-hour* flight performing the *duties of Pilot-in-Command* in a *gas balloon*

data.name: BalloonGasMinFlightTestPrep
data.value: One *2-hour training* flight in a *gas balloon* within *2 calendar months* preceding the test

data.name: BalloonHotAirMinFlightTestPrep
data.value: *Two training* flights of *1 hour* each within *2 calendar months* preceding the test in a *hot-air balloon*

data.name: BalloonMinFlights
data.value: *6 training* flights with an *instructor* in a *ballooon*

data.name: NoteBalloonAscent
data.value: The Maximum Altitude property for the flight is used to determine if this is met; be sure to use an AGL value rather than MSL.

data.name: MinLandingsFSToweredAirport
data.value: *3 full-stop solo landings* at a *towered* airport

data.name: NoteToweredAirport
data.value: Landings at a towered airport are assumed to be full-stop if full-stop is required and if enough full-stop landings are recorded in the flight

data.name: JARPPLHelicopterDisclaimer
data.value: ADDITIONAL NOTES: The regulations require that the experience below be all done in a single type of helicopter; %APP_NAME% is not enforcing this. Please ensure that you have met these requirements in a single type of helicopter. The night qualification requirements cannot be deterministically computed and thus are omitted here.

data.name: JARPPLMinSoloLongXC
data.value: 1 *solo cross-country* flight of at least *{0}NM*, including *2 full-stop landings* at *2 airports* other than the point of departure

data.name: JARPPLMinSoloNote
data.value: ("Supervised solo" includes solo time or Duties of PIC time with an authorized instructor on board)

data.name: JARPPLMinTimeNote
data.value: (May include up to 5 hours of simulator time; %APP_NAME% will include anything in which you can log an instrument approach)

data.name: Part141MultiEngineSoloDisclaimer
data.value: ADDITIONAL NOTES: Part 141 for multi-engine aircraft requires "performing the duties of a pilot in command while under the supervision of a certificated flight instructor" rather than solo. You can specify this for a flight by indicating Duties of PIC ("DPIC") time and that the flight had an Instructor On Board (in additional properties). DPIC is distinct from dual received, so any dual time logged on such a flight that overlaps with DPIC time is not counted.

data.name: CommBalloonAscent
data.value: One flight involving a controlled ascent to *{0:#,###}ft* above the launch site

data.name: CommBalloonDPIC
data.value: *2* flights performing *duties of PIC* in a *gas balloon*

data.name: CommBalloonSolo
data.value: *Two solo* flights in a *hot air balloon*

data.name: CommBalloonHotAirTestPrep
data.value: *Two training* flights of *1 hour* each within *2* calendar months preceding the test in a *hot air balloon*

data.name: CommBalloonGasTestPrep
data.value: *Two training* flights of *2* hours each within *2 calendar months* preceding the test *in a gas balloon*

data.name: NoteTestPrep
data.value: %APP_NAME% is showing whether you are eligible to take the practical test TODAY; this progress can decay over time after your checkride.

data.name: ATPAirplaneClassSimulatorNote
data.value: A maximum of 25 hours of time in a "full flight simulator" may contribute to this, if done per parts 121, 135, 141, or 142. %APP_NAME% assumes that any time logged in a simulator for which landings are approved meets this requirement.

data.name: ATPAirplaneNightLandingsNote
data.value: Per [61.159(b)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.159), if you've done at least 20 night takeoffs and night full-stop landings, then each such takeoff+landing after that can substitute for an hour of required night flight, up to 25 hours.

data.name: ATPTimeInClass
data.value: *{0}* hours of flight time in an *{1} airplane*

data.name: CASRCommLongCrossCountry
data.value: 1 *cross-country* flight as *PIC* (*{0}*) that is at least *{1}NM* and includes *{2}* at at least *2* other airports or landing areas

data.name: CASRPPLMinTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight time as a pilot

data.name: CASRPPLMinTimeInCategory
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight time as a pilot (*{1}*)

data.name: CASRPPLSoloLongCrossCountry
data.value: 1 *solo cross-country* flight (*{0}*) that is at least *{1}NM* and includes *{2}* at at least *2* other airports or landing areas

data.name: TitleCASRCommAirplaneNoTraining
data.value: CASR - Commercial Pilot, Aeroplane, Integrated Training NOT Completed

data.name: TitleCASRCommAirplaneTraining
data.value: CASR - Commercial Pilot, Aeroplane, Integrated Training Completed

data.name: TitleCASRCommHeliNoTraining
data.value: CASR - Commercial Pilot, Helicopter Integrated Training NOT Completed

data.name: TitleCASRCommHeliTraining
data.value: CASR - Commercial Pilot, Helicopter Integrated Training Completed

data.name: TitleCASRPPLAirplaneNoTraining
data.value: CASR - Private Pilot, Aeroplane, Integrated Training NOT Completed

data.name: TitleCASRPPLAirplaneTraining
data.value: CASR - Private Pilot, Aeroplane, Integrated Training Completed

data.name: TitleCASRPPLHeliNoTraining
data.value: CASR - Private Pilot, Helicopter, Integrated Training NOT Completed

data.name: TitleCASRPPLHeliTraining
data.value: CASR - Private Pilot, Helicopter, Integrated Training Completed

data.name: SportMinFlightsGlider
data.value: *10* training flights in a *glider* (5 if you already have 20 hours in heavier-than-air aircraft)

data.name: SportMinLandings
data.value: *10* takeoffs & landings in a *{0}*. (Landings must be full-stop for airplane rating)

data.name: SportMinLandingsNote
data.value: Each solo flight with a landing is assumed to have a corresponding solo launch. Think about it.

data.name: SportMinSoloGlider
data.value: *2* hours of *solo* flight in a *glider* (1 if you already have 20 hours in heavier-than-air aircraft)

data.name: SportMinSoloLandings
data.value: *5 solo launches/landings* (3 if you already have 20 hours in heavier-than-air aircraft)

data.name: SportMinTimeGlider
data.value: *10* hours of flight time in a *glider* (3 if you already have 20 hours in heavier-than-air aircraft)

data.name: SportMinTraining
data.value: At least *3 training flights* within the *2* calendar months prior to the test

data.name: SportPilotLandingNote
data.value: For simplicity, this is assuming one takeoff per landing and a flight in the pattern.

data.name: SportSoloXCFlight
data.value: *Solo cross-country* flight in a *{0}* of at least *{1}NM* that includes *2 full-stop landings* and a straight line distance over *25NM*

data.name: SportTestPrepTime
data.value: *2* hours of flight *training* within the *2* calendar months prior to the test

data.name: TitleSportSingleEngineLand
data.value: FAR 61.313(a) - Sport Pilot, Airplane Single Engine Land

data.name: Comm141DayXCFlight
data.value: One *cross-country* flight in *daytime* conditions that is at least *{0}hrs* and goes at least *{1}NM* from the point of departure

data.name: Comm141InstrumentTrainingNote
data.value: For an airplane rating, a view-limiting device is required, so this is looking for simulated instrument conditions; unusual attitudes, partial panel operations, attitude instrument flying, etc., are all assumed

data.name: Comm141MinComplexOrTurbine
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of *training* in *{1}* that is *complex or turbine-powered*

data.name: Comm141MinTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of flight *training* from a CFI

data.name: Comm141NightXCFlight
data.value: One *cross-country* flight in *nighttime* conditions that is at least *{0:#,##0}hrs* and goes at least *{1}NM* from the point of departure

data.name: Comm141SoloNight
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of *solo* (or duties-of-PIC with an authorized instructor on board) flight in *night VFR* conditions

data.name: Comm141SoloTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of *solo* time (or duties-of-PIC with an authorized instructor on board) in *{1}*

data.name: Comm141SoloXCFlight
data.value: One *solo* (or duties-of-PIC with an authorized instructor on board) *cross country* flight with at least *3* landings and a segment with a straight-line distance of at least *{0}NM*

data.name: Comm141SoloXCHawaiiNote
data.value: In Hawaii, a cross-country segment of 150NM satisfies this

data.name: Comm141TestPrep
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of test prep in *{1}* within *{2} days* preceding the test

data.name: Comm141TestPrepNote
data.value: %APP_NAME% is showing whether you are eligible to take the practical test TODAY; this progress can decay over time after your checkride. This is looking for dual received.

data.name: Comm141TrainingNote
data.value: Any dual received is assumed to cover the required areas of operation.

data.name: Title141CommercialMultiEngineLand
data.value: Part 141 - Commercial, Airplane, Multi Engine Land

data.name: Title141CommercialSingleEngineLand
data.value: Part 141 - Commercial, Airplane, Single Engine Land

data.name: Comm141OverallTimeNote
data.value: Per 141 Appendix D (4)(c), you may be entitled to credit time in a simulator or FTD, depending on the certification level of the device. Time in training devices is NOT included here.

data.name: ATPMinXCTimeNoteRestricted
data.value: Per FAR [61.160(e) and (f)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.160), the cross-country limit here is 200 hours if you have 1500 total hours or are applying under 61.160(a)-(d)

data.name: ATPRestrictedEducationNote
data.value: [61.160](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.160) describes a variety of conditions regarding your education and ratings that you must have met which %APP_NAME% cannot verify. It is your responsibility to ensure that you have met these requirements.

data.name: ATPRestrictedMilitaryNote
data.value: This does not apply if you had other than an honorable discharge, or if you did not earn a rating as a military pilot. %APP_NAME% cannot verify either of these.

data.name: Title61160PartialDegree
data.value: FAR 61.160(d) - Airplane - Multi-Engine, Restricted (30-60 credit hours)

data.name: Part135PICDisclaimer
data.value: Progress here is only computing the flight experience requirements. You are also required to have appropriate ratings; %APP_NAME% cannot validate the status of your ratings

data.name: Part135PICIFRTime
data.value: *75* hours of *actual or simulated instrument* time

data.name: Part135PICIFRTimeInFlight
data.value: *50* hours of *actual or simulated instrument* time *in flight*

data.name: Part135PICMinTime
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of total time as a pilot

data.name: EASAClassAirplaneNote
data.value: All time in airplanes or TMGs is included here, not just dual, on the assumption that if you have not yet earned your LAPL license, it's all training/instruction.

data.name: EASAClassHelicopterNote
data.value: All time in helicopters is included here, not just dual, on the assumption that if you have not yet earned your LAPL license, it's all training/instruction. 35 hours of this must be in the same type of helicopter that will be used for your test. Without knowing what type you will be using, %APP_NAME% cannot compute this for you.

data.name: EASALAPLAirplaneMinSoloXCMinDist
data.value: 1 *solo cross-country* flight of at least *{0}NM* with a *full-stop landing* at a different airport

data.name: EASASupervisedSoloNote
data.value: The regulations specify "supervised solo" - %APP_NAME% counts either solo time or Duties of PIC time with an instructor on-board towards this

data.name: TitleEASALAPLAirplane
data.value: EASA - LAPL(A) - Light Aircraft Pilot License, Airplane

data.name: TitleEASALAPLHelicopter
data.value: EASA - LAPL(H) - Light Aircraft Pilot License, Helicopter

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneDual
data.value: *10* hours of *dual flight instruction* in a *sailplane*

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneLaunchesNotes
data.value: Each landing assumes a corresponding launch

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneNoteTMG
data.value: Up to 7 of these hours may be in a Touring Motor Glider (TMG)

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneSolo
data.value: *2* hours of *supervised solo* flight time (solo or Duties of PIC with an instructor on board)

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneTitle
data.value: EASA - LAPL(S) - Light Aircraft Pilot License, Sailplane

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneTMGNote
data.value: %APP_NAME% treats "Sailplanes" as synonymous with "Glider", and "Powered Sailplanes" as synonymous with "Touring Motor Glider (TMG)"

data.name: EASALAPLSailplaneXC
data.value: *1 solo cross-country* flight of at least *27NM* or *1* *dual cross-country* flight of at least *55NM*

data.name: ATPTotalTimeSubstitutionNote
data.value: Per [61.159(c)](https://www.law.cornell.edu/cfr/text/14/61.159), SIC time and some Flight Engineer Time can contribute towards this; and per 61.159(a)(6) up to 100hrs of FTD/FFS time can also contribute. %APP_NAME% assumes that the conditions for doing so have been met.

data.name: MinInstrumentTime141
data.value: *35* Hours of *actual or simulated instrument* time

data.name: Note141InstrumentReducedHours
data.value: Only 15 hours are required if this is for an additional instrument rating. Use of simulators/FTDs/ATDs are included up to the limits described by 141 Appendix (C)(4)(b)

data.name: CANightInstrumentNote
data.value: Up to 5 hours of ground-sim time can contribute to this.

data.name: CAPPLGroundSimNote
data.value: Up to 3 hours may be performed in a ground simulator

data.name: JARPPLMinDualNightLongXC
data.value: 1 *dual cross-country* flight at night of at least *{0}NM*

data.name: CAPPLSoloLandingsInClass
data.value: *5* takeoffs and landings as the *sole occupant* of *{0}*

data.name: CAPPLSoloNote
data.value: %APP_NAME% is just looking for total landings, assuming that you did the takeoffs. For seaplanes, if the aircraft requires two crewmembers, then you may substitute PIC time for this. %APP_NAME% does not do this for you.

data.name: SADualXC
data.value: A *dual night cross-country* flight of at least *{0}NM* with *2* landings (full-stop if in an aeroplane) away from base

data.name: SANightInstrumentNote
data.value: Up to 5 hours of this may be done in an approved FSTD, or may be credited if you have an instrument rating in another category

data.name: SASoloLongXC
data.value: A *solo cross-country* flight of at least *{0}NM*, including *full-stop* landings at *2* aerodromes. For aeroplanes, a leg of at least 50NM from base is also required

data.name: TitleSAPPLAirplane
data.value: South Africa - PPL(A): Aeroplane Private Pilot

data.name: TitleSAPPLHelicopter
data.value: South Africa - PPL(H): Helicopter Private Pilot

data.name: CommSoloNote
data.value: Time spent performing duties of PIC with an authorized instructor on board may count towards this; however, since this is a substitute for solo, any dual instruction time received will be subtracted from duties-of-PIC time, which may prevent a flight from counting towards this. (Google "FAA duties of PIC Kuhn" for details) Also, note that you may use solo time OR duties-of-PIC-with-an-instructor, but not both; whichever has more time is displayed here. (Google "FAA 2016 Grannis Solo" for details.)

data.name: CommGliderHeavierThanAir
data.value: *200* hours of flight time in *heavier-than-air* aircraft

data.name: CommGliderTestPrep
data.value: *3 training* flights in a *glider* within *2* calendar months preceding the test

data.name: CommGeneralDisclaimer
data.value: %APP_NAME% cannot determine what ratings you held when a given flight was logged. Per FAA interpretation (Google "Theriault 61.129" for details), activities displayed here that were done while still a student pilot may not actually count towards your rating.

data.name: DPECommInstrumentDisclaimer
data.value: For large turbine-powered aircraft, you also need 300 hours acting as PIC in large turbine-powered aircraft, of which 50 hours are in the type sought. You also need to have spent 150 hours preparing airmen for commercial or ATP certificates

data.name: DPEInstrument
data.value: *{0:#,##0} PIC hours* of *instrument* flight (actual or simulated)

data.name: DPEInstrumentInstructionDisclaimer
data.value: At least 100 hours of this must be preparing pilots for their commercial certificate; %APP_NAME% cannot verify this.

data.name: DPEPICTimePastYear
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours *PIC* time in past *12 months* in *{1}*

data.name: TitleDPEPPLAMEL
data.value: Order 8000.95D - Airplane - Multi-Engine Land, PPL and Comm.

data.name: TitleDPEPPLAMES
data.value: Order 8000.95D - Airplane - Multi-Engine Sea, PPL and Comm

data.name: TitleDPEPPLASEL
data.value: Order 8000.95D - Airplane - Single-Engine Land, PPL and Comm

data.name: TitleDPEPPLASES
data.value: Order 8000.95D - Airplane - Single-Engine Sea, PPL and Comm

data.name: Title141CommercialMultiEngineSea
data.value: Part 141 - Commercial, Airplane, Multi Engine Sea

data.name: Title141CommercialSingleEngineSea
data.value: Part 141 - Commercial, Airplane, Single Engine Sea

data.name: Part135XCNote
data.value: Cross-country time here uses the logged Cross-Country time for a flight or the Total Time, if the route has more than one airport, whichever is greater

data.name: CAATPExtraXC
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* additional hours of *cross-country* time as PIC

data.name: CAATPExtraXCNote
data.value: Or, 200 hours of any combination of PIC/Co-Pilot cross-country time

data.name: CAATPInstrumentNote
data.value: Up to {0:#,##0} hours of time in {1} can apply towards this

data.name: CAATPNight
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of night as PIC or co-pilot

data.name: CAATPNightCategory
data.value: *{0:#,##0}* hours of *night as PIC or co-pilot* in *{1}*

data.name: CAATPPICUSNote
data.value: Up to {0:#,##0} hours of PICUS time may be applied here; if both PICUS and PIC are logged on a flight, they are assumed to be simultaneous.

data.name: MinInstrumentTraining
data.value: *15* hours of *instrument training* from an authorized instructor (CFII)

data.name: MinInstrumentTrainingNote
data.value: Any dual with IMC or Simulated IMC contributes to this, but %APP_NAME% cannot determine what rating your instructor held, so this may OVERSTATE your progress. Also, 61.65(h) and (i) are ambiguous whether ATD/FTD/FFS time contributes to this, so %APP_NAME% is conservative and only allows time in a real aircraft towards this requirement. You may be able to apply more time than shown here.

data.name: CommGyroplaneNightLandings
data.value: *10 night training landings* to full stop in a *gyroplane*

data.name: CFISASELTotalSEL
data.value: *50* hours of flight time in a *single-engine airplane*

data.name: CFISASELTotalTime
data.value: *150* hours of flight time as a pilot

data.name: CFISASELXCSEL
data.value: *10* hours of *cross-country* flight time in a *single-engine airplane*

data.name: NoteLSATime
data.value: 15 hours of this must be in an aircraft certified as an LSA; %APP_NAME% does not know which aircraft are certified as an LSA, so cannot determine this for you

data.name: CommCanadaMinIFRNote
data.value: Up to 10 hours of this time may be performed in approved simulators

data.name: CommCanadaMinNightDual
data.value: *5* hours of *night dual instruction* in *aeroplanes* (since PPL)

data.name: CommCanadaMinXCDual
data.value: *5* hours of *cross-country instruction* in aeroplanes (since PPL)

data.name: CommCanadaSoloNightLandings
data.value: *10 solo landings* at *night* (since PPL; circuits are assumed)

data.name: CommCanadaSoloNightTakeoffs
data.value: *10 solo takeoffs* at *night* (since PPL; circuits are assumed)

data.name: CommCanadaSoloNote
data.value: The regs require an emphasis on "the improvement of general flying skills"; this is assumed.

data.name: CommCanadaSoloXC
data.value: *Solo cross-country* flight at least *300NM* away from the point of departure, with at least *3* landings (since PPL)

data.name: InstrumentCanadaGeneralDisclaimer
data.value: Note that 421.46(2)(b) also has requirements regarding the rating of your instructor; %APP_NAME% cannot determine this and thus does not measure it.

data.name: MinInstrumentXCCanada
data.value: A *cross-country* flight of at least *{0}NM* with at least *2 approaches* at *2 locations*

data.name: MinInstrumentXCCanadaNote
data.value: Assumes all approaches were done to minimums

data.name: NoteCanadaIRXC
data.value: Only includes time in helicopters or airplanes

data.name: TitleSportSingleEngineSea
data.value: FAR 61.313(a) - Sport Pilot, Airplane Single Engine Sea

data.name: TitleSportWeightShiftControlLand
data.value: FAR 61.313(h) - Sport Pilot, Weight-shift Control Land

data.name: TitleSportWeightShiftControlSea
data.value: FAR 61.313(h) - Sport Pilot, Weight-shift Control Sea

data.name: CANightDualNote
data.value: Prior to earning your night rating, you cannot simultaneously apply night and instrument (IMC or hood) time, so any time that is clearly night and instrument here does not contribute to progress here.

data.name: RatingProgressPrintHeaderTemplate
data.comment: {0} = the milestone, {1} is the user's name, {2} is the current date

data.name: MinIFRTrainingByRef
data.value: *10* hours of *training* in an *airplane* by reference to *instruments*

data.name: NoteMinIFRTrainingUK
data.value: %APP_NAME% assumes that any dual instruction received on a flight that contains any actual or simulated IMC counts to is counted towards this. Also, any certified simulator is credited towards the 5 hour allowance, which may be more than you are entitled to.

data.name: MinUKTotalTimeTrainingNote
data.value: This is required to be after issuance of a PPL certificate; %APP_NAME% cannot determine reliably when you earned this, so may OVERSTATE your time here

data.name: CommSoloXCGyroplane
data.value: A *cross-country flight* in a *gyroplane* with landings at *3* points, with one segment at least *50NM* from the original point of departure.

data.name: CustomProgressItemTemplate
data.comment: 0=FAR/regulation, 1=Title, 2 = threshold, 3 = field to sum, {4} is optional query

data.name: ErrCustomProgressQueryNotFound
data.value: Saved search "{0}" not found - cannot compute progress against rating.

data.name: CustomProgressDeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this rating? This cannot be undone!

data.name: CustomProgressDeleteMilestoneConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this milestone? This cannot be undone!

data.name: CustomProgressItemNewMilestoneNoteTip
data.value: Add any text here that you want to display along with progress for the milestone, such as assumptions made or alternatives that may be allowed

data.name: CustomProgressNewMilestoneFARRefNote
data.value: Name and section/subsection for the regulation, or a simple number for sorting

data.name: CustomProgressNewMilestoneFARRefRequired
data.value: A reference must be provided. You can use a simple number for sorting.

data.name: CustomProgressNewMilestoneThresholdRequired
data.value: A threshold greater than 0 is required

data.name: CustomProgressNewMilestoneTitleTip
data.value: Hint: surround words with asterisks (*) to make them bold.

data.name: DetailFlightsIgnored
data.value: The following flights were not included because the cross-country distance did not meet the requirements of 61.1 for this rating:

data.name: MinInstrumentTrainingNonUS
data.value: *15* hours of *instrument training* from an authorized instructor

data.name: DPEAirplane800095CDisclaimer
data.value: Order 8000.95C also requires 150 hours preparing airmen for commercial or ATP certificates; this requirement is not reflected here.

data.name: DPERotorcraft800095DDisclaimer
data.value: Order 8000.95D also requires 100 hours (50 for gyroplanes) preparing airmen for commercial or ATP certificates; this requirement is not reflected here. For large helicopters, you also need 100 hours acting as PIC in large helicopters, including at least 50 hours in the type sought; this, too, is also not reflected here.

data.name: DPEDisclaimerPreparing
data.value: You also need 150 hours preparing airmen for Commercial or ATP certificates with Airplane categories
